webServices.description: Handle authentication.

actions.description: Logout a user.
Check credentials. Returns true for anonymous user.

webServices.description: Get information on Compute Engine tasks.

actions.description:
Search for tasks.
Either componentId or component can be provided, but not both.
Requires the project administration permission if componentId or component is set.

changelog.description: The use of module keys in parameters 'q' is deprecated
field "logs" is deprecated and its value is always false
it's no more possible to specify the page parameter.

params.description: Key of the component (project) to filter on
Id of the component (project) to filter on
Maximum date of end of task processing (inclusive)
Filter on the last tasks (only the most recent finished task by project)
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 1000

Limit search to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that are exactly the same as the supplied string
  • task ids that are exactly the same as the supplied string
Must not be set together with componentId
Comma separated list of task statuses

actions.description:
Returns CE activity related metrics.
Requires 'Administer' permission on the specified project.

changelog.description: New field 'pendingTime' in response, only included when there are pending tasks

params.description: Id of the component (project) to filter on
Key of the component (project) to filter on

actions.description:
Get the pending tasks, in-progress tasks and the last executed task of a given component (usually a project).
Requires the following permission: 'Browse' on the specified component.
Either 'componentId' or 'component' must be provided.

changelog.description: The use of module keys in parameter "component" is deprecated
field "logs" is deprecated and its value is always false

actions.description:
Give Compute Engine task details such as type, status, duration and associated component.
Requires 'Execute Analysis' permission.

params.description: Comma-separated list of the optional fields to be returned in response.

webServices.description: Get information about a component (file, directory, project, ...) and its ancestors or descendants. Update a project or module key.

actions.description: Search for projects. Used to provide the ability to search for any component but this option has been removed and webservice 'api/components/tree' should be used instead for this purpose

params.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

Limit search to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that are exactly the same as the supplied string

actions.description: Returns a component (file, directory, project) and its ancestors. The ancestors are ordered from the parent to the root project. Requires the following permission: 'Browse' on the project of the specified component.

changelog.description: Added isCctIndexed to the response. It is a temporary field that will be removed soon

actions.description:
Navigate through components based on the chosen strategy.
Requires the following permission: 'Browse' on the specified project.
When limiting search with the q parameter, directories are not returned.

changelog.description: The use of 'BRC' as value for parameter 'qualifiers' is deprecated
The use of module keys in parameter 'component' is deprecated

params.description: Base component key. The search is based on this component.
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

Limit search to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that are exactly the same as the supplied string

Comma-separated list of component qualifiers. Filter the results with the specified qualifiers. Possible values are:
  • BRC - Sub-projects
  • DIR - Directories
  • FIL - Files
  • TRK - Projects
  • UTS - Test Files

Strategy to search for base component descendants:
  • children: return the children components of the base component. Grandchildren components are not returned
  • all: return all the descendants components of the base component. Grandchildren are returned.
  • leaves: return all the descendant components (files, in general) which don't have other children. They are the leaves of the component tree.

webServices.description: Get duplication information for a project.

actions.description: Get duplications. Require Browse permission on file's project

changelog.description: The fields 'uuid', 'projectUuid', 'subProjectUuid' are deprecated in the response.

params.description: File ID. If provided, 'key' must not be provided.

webServices.description: Manage user favorites

actions.description:
Add a project as favorite for the authenticated user.
Only 100 components can be added as favorite.
Requires authentication and the following permission: 'Browse' on the project.

changelog.description: It's no longer possible to have more than 100 favorites by qualifier
It's no longer possible to set a directory as favorite
The use of module keys in parameter 'component' is deprecated

params.description: Component key. Only components with qualifier TRK are supported

actions.description:
Remove a component (project, directory, file etc.) as favorite for the authenticated user.
Requires authentication.

changelog.description: The use of module keys in parameter 'component' is deprecated

actions.description:
Search for the authenticated user favorites.
Requires authentication.

params.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

webServices.description: Removed since 6.3, please use api/favorites instead

actions.description: The web service is removed and you're invited to use api/favorites instead

webServices.description: Read and update Security Hotspots.

actions.description:
Change the status of a Security Hotpot.
Requires the 'Administer Security Hotspot' permission.

params.exampleValue: This is safe because user input is validated by the calling code

params.description: Resolution of the Security Hotspot when new status is REVIEWED, otherwise must not be set.
New status of the Security Hotspot.

actions.description: Search for Security Hotpots.

changelog.description: Add fields 'rule' and 'textRange' in the response

params.description: Comma-separated list of file uuids. Returns only hotspots found in those files. If set, 'files' must not be set.
Comma-separated list of file paths. Returns only hotspots found in those files. If set, 'fileUuids' must not be set.
Comma-separated list of Security Hotspot keys. This parameter is required unless projectKey is provided.
If 'projectKey' is provided, returns only Security Hotspots assigned to the current user
Key of the project or application. This parameter is required unless hotspots is provided.
Page size. Must be greater than 0.
If 'projectKey' is provided and if status is 'REVIEWED', only Security Hotspots with the specified resolution are returned.
If '%s' is provided, only Security Hotspots created since the leak period are returned.
If 'projectKey' is provided, only Security Hotspots with the specified status are returned.

actions.description: Provides the details of a Security Hotspot.

webServices.description: Read and update issues.

actions.description:
Add a comment.
Requires authentication and the following permission: 'Browse' on the project of the specified issue.

changelog.description: Possible values 'INFO' and 'BLOCKER' for response field 'severity' of 'impacts' have been added

params.description: Define is the given comment is a feedback

params.exampleValue: Won't fix because it doesn't apply to the context

actions.description: Assign/Unassign an issue. Requires authentication and Browse permission on project

changelog.description: Possible values 'INFO' and 'BLOCKER' for response field 'severity' of 'impacts' have been added

params.description: Login of the assignee. When not set, it will unassign the issue. Use '_me' to assign to current user

actions.description:
Search SCM accounts which match a given query.
Requires authentication.

changelog.description: The maximum size of 'ps' is set to 100

params.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 100
Limit search to authors that contain the supplied string.

actions.description:
Bulk change on issues.
Requires authentication.

changelog.description: Transition 'wontfix' is now deprecated. Use transition 'accept' instead.

params.description: To assign the list of issues to a specific user (login), or un-assign all the issues
To add a comment to a list of issues
Define if the given comment is a feedback
To change the severity of the list of issues
To change the type of the list of issues

actions.description:
Display changelog of an issue.
Requires the 'Browse' permission on the project of the specified issue.

Delete a comment.
Requires authentication and the following permission: 'Browse' on the project of the specified issue.

Do workflow transition on an issue. Requires authentication and Browse permission on project.
The transitions 'accept', 'wontfix', and 'falsepositive' require the permission 'Administer Issues'.
The transitions involving security hotspots require the permission 'Administer Security Hotspot'.

changelog.description: Possible values 'INFO' and 'BLOCKER' for response field 'severity' of 'impacts' have been added
The transition 'wontfix' is deprecated. Please use 'accept' instead.

params.exampleValue: Won't fix because it doesn't apply to the context

params.description: Define is the given comment is a feedback

actions.description:
Edit a comment.
Requires authentication and the following permission: 'Browse' on the project of the specified issue.

changelog.description: Possible values 'INFO' and 'BLOCKER' for response field 'severity' of 'impacts' have been added

params.exampleValue: Won't fix because it doesn't apply to the context

actions.description:
Search for issues.
Requires the 'Browse' permission on the specified project(s).

changelog.description: Added support for searching issues across projects in an organization
Possible values 'INFO' and 'BLOCKER' for response field 'impactSeverities' of 'facets' have been added
Possible values 'INFO' and 'BLOCKER' for response field 'severity' of 'impacts' have been added
Parameters 'resolutions' and 'statuses' are deprecated. Use 'issueStatuses' instead.
Values of parameter 'facets': 'statuses', 'resolutions' are deprecated. Use 'issueStatuses' instead.
Response field 'status' and 'resolution' are deprecated. Use 'issueStatus' instead.
Value 'wontfix' for 'transition' response field is deprecated, use 'accept' instead
Possible value 'accept' for 'transition' response field has been added
Issue flows in the response may contain description and type fields

params.description: Comma-separated list of the optional fields to be returned in response. Action plans are dropped in 5.5, it is not returned in the response.
To retrieve assigned or unassigned issues
Comma-separated list of assignee logins. The value '__me__' can be used as a placeholder for user who performs the request
SCM accounts. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.
Comma-separated list of clean code attribute categories.
Comma-separated list of component keys. Retrieve issues associated to a specific list of components (and all its descendants). A component can be a project, directory or file.

To retrieve issues created after the given date (inclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided.
If this parameter is set, createdSince must not be set
Datetime to retrieve issues created during a specific analysis

To retrieve issues created before the given date (inclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided.

To retrieve issues created during a time span before the current time (exclusive). Accepted units are 'y' for year, 'm' for month, 'w' for week and 'd' for day. If this parameter is set, createdAfter must not be set
Comma-separated list of CWE identifiers. Use 'unknown' to select issues not associated to any CWE.
Choose the returned value for facet items, either count of issues or sum of remediation effort.
Comma-separated list of the facets to be computed. No facet is computed by default.
Comma-separated list of languages. Available since 4.4
Return only issues at a component's level, not on its descendants (modules, directories, files, etc). This parameter is only considered when componentKeys or componentUuids is set.
Comma-separated list of OWASP Mobile Top 10 - 2024 lowercase categories.
Comma-separated list of OWASP Top 10 lowercase categories.
Comma-separated list of OWASP Top 10 - 2021 lowercase categories.
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500
To match resolved or unresolved issues
Comma-separated list of coding rule keys. Format is <repository>:<rule>

To retrieve issues created since the leak period.
If this parameter is set to a truthy value, createdAfter must not be set and one component id or key must be provided.
Comma-separated list of SonarSource security categories. Use 'others' to select issues not associated with any category

changelog.description: The use of module keys in parameter 'component' is deprecated
the response field id is deprecated. Use key instead.
the response field refId is deprecated. Use refKey instead.

params.description: Comma-separated list of additional fields that can be returned in the response.

Deprecated parameter, used previously with the Developer Cockpit plugin. No measures are returned if parameter is set.

actions.description:
Navigate through components based on the chosen strategy with specified measures. The baseComponentId or the component parameter must be provided.
Requires the following permission: 'Browse' on the specified project.
When limiting search with the q parameter, directories are not returned.

changelog.description: The use of module keys in parameter 'component' is deprecated
field 'bestValue' is added to the response
Number of metric keys is limited to 15
the response field id is deprecated. Use key instead.
the response field refId is deprecated. Use refKey instead.

params.description: Comma-separated list of additional fields that can be returned in the response.
Base component id. The search is based on this component.
Component key. The search is based on this component.
Deprecated parameter, used previously with the Developer Cockpit plugin. No measures are returned if parameter is set.
Deprecated parameter, used previously with the Developer Cockpit plugin. No measures are returned if parameter is set.
Comma-separated list of metric keys. Types DISTRIB, DATA are not allowed.
Sort measures by leak period or not ?. The 's' parameter must contain the 'metricPeriod' value.
Metric key to sort by. The 's' parameter must contain the 'metric' or 'metricPeriod' value. It must be part of the 'metricKeys' parameter

Filter components. Sort must be on a metric. Possible values are:
  • all: return all components
  • withMeasuresOnly: filter out components that do not have a measure on the sorted metric
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

Limit search to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that are exactly the same as the supplied string

Comma-separated list of component qualifiers. Filter the results with the specified qualifiers. Possible values are:
  • BRC - Sub-projects
  • DIR - Directories
  • FIL - Files
  • TRK - Projects
  • UTS - Test Files

Strategy to search for base component descendants:
  • children: return the children components of the base component. Grandchildren components are not returned
  • all: return all the descendants components of the base component. Grandchildren are returned.
  • leaves: return all the descendant components (files, in general) which don't have other children. They are the leaves of the component tree.

webServices.description: Manage notifications of the authenticated user

actions.description:
Add a notification for the authenticated user.
Requires one of the following permissions:
  • Authentication if no login is provided. If a project is provided, requires the 'Browse' permission on the specified project.
  • If a project is provided, requires the 'Browse' permission on the specified project.

params.description: Channel through which the notification is sent. For example, notifications can be sent by email.

Notification type. Possible values are for:
  • Global notifications: CeReportTaskFailure, ChangesOnMyIssue, SQ-MyNewIssues
  • Per project notifications: CeReportTaskFailure, ChangesOnMyIssue, NewAlerts, NewFalsePositiveIssue, NewIssues, SQ-MyNewIssues

actions.description: List notifications of the authenticated user
Remove a notification for the authenticated user

params.description: Channel through which the notification is sent. For example, notifications can be sent by email.

  • Global notifications: CeReportTaskFailure, ChangesOnMyIssue, SQ-MyNewIssues
  • Per project notifications: CeReportTaskFailure, ChangesOnMyIssue, NewAlerts, NewFalsePositiveIssue, NewIssues, SQ-MyNewIssues

webServices.description: Manage permission templates, and the granting and revoking of permissions at the global and project levels.

actions.description:
Add permission to a group.
This service defaults to global permissions, but can be limited to project permissions by providing project id or project key.
The group name or group id must be provided.
Requires the permission 'Administer' on the specified project.

params.description: Key of organization, used when group name is set

Permission
  • Possible values for global permissions: admin, profileadmin, gateadmin, scan, provisioning
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, securityhotspotadmin, scan, user

The group id or group name must be provided.

webServices.description: Manage project analyses.

actions.description:
Create a project analysis event.
Only event of category 'VERSION' and 'OTHER' can be created.
Requires the permission 'Administer' on the specified project.

Delete a project analysis.
Requires the permission 'Administer' on the project of the specified analysis.

Delete a project analysis event.
Only event of category 'VERSION' and 'OTHER' can be deleted.
Requires the permission 'Administer' on the specified project.

Search a project analyses and attached events.
Requires the following permission: 'Browse' on the specified project

params.description: Key of a long lived branch
Event category. Filter analyses that have at least one event of the category specified.

Filter analyses created after the given date (inclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

Filter analyses created before the given date (inclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided

actions.description:
Set an analysis as the baseline of the New Code Period on a project or a long-lived branch.
This manually set baseline overrides the `sonar.leak.period` setting.
Requires the permission 'Administer' on the specified project.

Unset any manually-set New Code Period baseline on a project or a long-lived branch.
Unsetting a manual baseline restores the use of the `sonar.leak.period` setting.
Requires the permission 'Administer' on the specified project.

Update a project analysis event.
Only events of category 'VERSION' and 'OTHER' can be updated.
Requires the permission 'Administer' on the specified project.

webServices.description: Manage branch (only available when the Branch plugin is installed)

actions.description:
Delete a non-main branch of a project.
Requires 'Administer' rights on the specified project.

List the branches of a project.
The statistics are the overall counts on long branches, and the count of issues detected on the changed code on short branches, and are only provided if the project parameter is specified.
If the project parameter is specified, requires the user to have 'Browse' or 'Execute analysis' rights on that project. Otherwise, only returns branches from projects on which this user has 'Browse' or 'Execute analysis' rights.

changelog.description: Application can be used on this web service
Made project parameter optional if a list of branchIds are provided, and added field 'branchId' to response.

params.description: List of up to 50 branch IDs - required unless project key is provided

params.description: New name of the main branch

At least one parameter is required among analyzedBefore, projects and q

params.description:
Filter the projects for which last analysis is older than the given date (exclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided.
Filter the projects that are provisioned

Limit to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string

actions.description:
Bulk update a project or module key and all its sub-components keys. The bulk update allows to replace a part of the current key by another string on the current project and all its sub-modules.
It's possible to simulate the bulk update by setting the parameter 'dryRun' at true. No key is updated with a dry run.
Ex: to rename a project with key 'my_project' to 'my_new_project' and all its sub-components keys, call the WS with parameters:
  • project: my_project
  • from: my_
  • to: my_new_
Requires the permission 'Administer' on the specified project.

params.description: Simulate bulk update. No component key is updated.
String to match in components keys

actions.description:
Create a project.
Requires 'Create Projects' permission

params.description: SCM Branch of the project. The key of the project will become key:branch, for instance 'SonarQube:branch-5.0'
Name of the project. If name is longer than 500, it is abbreviated.

Project New Code Definition Type

New code definitions of the following types are allowed:
  • previous_version
  • days
  • date
  • version

Project New Code Definition Value

For each new code definition type, a different value is expected:
  • value is 'previous_version', when the new code definition type is previous_version
  • value should be a date , when the new code definition type is date
  • value should be version string, when the new code definition type is version
  • value should be a number between 1 and 90, when the new code definition type is days

Whether the created project should be visible to everyone, or only specific user/groups.
If no visibility is specified, the default project visibility of the organization will be used.

params.description:
Condition metric.
Only metric of the following types are allowed:
  • INT

  • RATING
  • WORK_DUR
  • FLOAT
  • PERCENT

Following metrics are forbidden:
  • alert_status
  • security_hotspots
  • new_security_hotspots

Condition operator:
  • LT = is lower than
  • GT = is greater than

actions.description:
Get the quality gate status of a project or a Compute Engine task.
Either 'analysisId', 'projectId' or 'projectKey' must be provided
The different statuses returned are: OK, WARN, ERROR, NONE. The NONE status is returned when there is no quality gate associated with the analysis.
Returns an HTTP code 404 if the analysis associated with the task is not found or does not exist.

  • 'Browse' on the specified project

Key of the rule to update
Rule description (mandatory for custom rule and manual rule)
Optional note in markdown format. Use empty value to remove current note. Note is not changed if the parameter is not set.

webServices.description: Manage settings.

actions.description:
List settings definitions.
Requires 'Browse' permission when a component is specified
To access licensed settings, authentication is required
To access secured settings, one of the following permissions is required:
  • 'Execute Analysis'
  • 'Administer' rights on the specified component

changelog.description: The use of module keys in parameter 'component' is deprecated

actions.description:
Remove a setting value.
The settings defined in conf/sonar.properties are read-only and can't be changed.
Requires the permission 'Administer' on the specified component.

changelog.description: The use of module keys in parameter 'component' is deprecated
The settings defined in conf/sonar.properties are read-only and can't be changed

actions.description:
Update a setting value.
Either 'value' or 'values' must be provided.
The settings defined in conf/sonar.properties are read-only and can't be changed.
Requires the permission 'Administer' on the specified component.

changelog.description: The use of module keys in parameter 'component' is deprecated
The settings defined in conf/sonar.properties are read-only and can't be changed

params.description: Setting field values. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.
Organization key (for the Enterprise plan only)
Setting value. To reset a value, please use the reset web service.
Setting multi value. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.

actions.description:
List settings values.
If no value has been set for a setting, then the default value is returned.
Both component and organization parameters cannot be used together.
Requires 'Browse' or 'Execute Analysis' permission when a component is specified.
Requires to be member of the organization if one is specified.
To access secured settings, one of the following permissions is required: 'Execute Analysis' or 'Administer' rights on the specified component
The returned attributes are:
  • 'key': The key of the setting
  • 'value': The value of setting
  • 'inherited': True if the value is being inherited from a parent setting
  • 'parentValue: The value of the parent setting if the value is not inherited'
  • 'parentOrigin: The origin of the parentValue (INSTANCE, ORGANIZATION, PROJECT)'

changelog.description: Adding the organization parameter to only get settings set at the organisation level
The use of module keys in parameter 'component' is deprecated
The settings from conf/sonar.properties are excluded from results.

Get SCM information of source files. Require See Source Code permission on file's project
Each element of the result array is composed of:

  3. Datetime of the commit (before 5.2 it was only the Date)
  4. Revision of the commit (added in 5.2)

  2. Content of the line

Generate a user access token.
Please keep your tokens secret. They enable to authenticate and analyze projects.
The endpoint generates a token for the logged in user.

params.description: User login. If not set, the token is generated for the authenticated user.

actions.description:
Revoke a user access token.
It requires administration permissions to specify a 'login' and revoke a token for another user. Otherwise, the token for the current user is revoked.

List the access tokens of a user.
The login must exist and active.
Field 'lastConnectionDate' is only updated every hour, so it may not be accurate, for instance when a user is using a token many times in less than one hour.

The key of the organization that will own the webhook
The key of the project that will own the webhook
If provided, secret will be used as the key to generate the HMAC hex (lowercase) digest value in the 'X-Sonar-Webhook-HMAC-SHA256' header

Server endpoint that will receive the webhook payload, for example 'http://my_server/foo'. If HTTP Basic authentication is used, HTTPS is recommended to avoid man in the middle attacks. Example: 'https://myLogin:myPassword@my_server/foo'

actions.description:
Delete a Webhook.
Requires 'Administer' permission on the specified project, or global 'Administer' permission.

params.description: The key of the webhook to be deleted, auto-generated value can be obtained through api/webhooks/create or api/webhooks/list

actions.description:
Get the recent deliveries for a specified project or Compute Engine task.
Require 'Administer' permission on the related project.
Note that additional information are returned by api/webhooks/delivery.

params.description: Id of the Compute Engine task
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less than 500
Key of the webhook that triggered those deliveries, auto-generated value that can be obtained through api/webhooks/create or api/webhooks/list

actions.description:
Get a webhook delivery by its id.
Note that additional information are returned by api/webhooks/delivery.

Search for global webhooks or project webhooks. Webhooks are ordered by name.
Requires 'Administer' permission on the specified project, or global 'Administer' permission.

changelog.description: Field 'secret' replaced by flag 'hasSecret' in response

actions.description:
Update a Webhook.
Requires 'Administer' permission on the specified project, or global 'Administer' permission.

params.description: If provided, secret will be used as the key to generate the HMAC hex (lowercase) digest value in the 'X-Sonar-Webhook-HMAC-SHA256' header. If blank, any secret previously configured will be removed. If not set, the secret will remain unchanged.
new url to be called by the webhook
The key of the webhook to be updated, auto-generated value can be obtained through api/webhooks/create or api/webhooks/list
